main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Tucson, Arizona on November 6, 1957, involving a glowing object observed for 6 minutes.
interesting points: The object exhibited a sharp reddish glow that changed to red and orange before disappearing., It had definite flight characteristics, moving from 18 degrees to 70 degrees elevation in 15 seconds., The object produced no sound and did not display zig-zag motion., It was reported as a cigar-shaped object with a sharp nose., Witnesses included local residents such as a housewife and firemen.
sighted object: glowing cigar-shaped object with a sharp nose
witness description: housewife and firemen in Tucson, Arizona
